targets.query: select "name" as "container", alameda_scaler_namespace as namespace, alameda_scaler_name as "alameda scaler", pod_name as pod, node_name as node, "policy", is_alameda from alameda_cluster_status..container group by "alameda_scaler_namespace", "alameda_scaler_name", "pod_name", "name" order by time desc limit 1
select create_time *1000 , "name", node_cpu_cores, node_memory_bytes, in_cluster from alameda_cluster_status..node

select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."container" where  kind = 'raw' and granularity = '30' and "metric" = 'cpu_usage_seconds_percentage' and "namespace" = '$ns'  and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and time >=now()-1h and time < now() group by time(30s)

select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."container" where kind = 'upper_bound' and granularity = '30' and "metric" = 'cpu_usage_seconds_percentage' and "name" =~ /^[[h_container]]$/ and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and "namespace" = '$ns'   AND time >= now() and time <= now() + 14m group by time(30s)

select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."container" where kind = 'lower_bound' and granularity = '30' and "metric" = 'cpu_usage_seconds_percentage' and "name" =~ /^[[h_container]]$/ and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and "namespace" ='$ns'  AND time >= now() and time <= now() + 14m group by time(30s)

select sum from (select sum(value), count(value) from "alameda_prediction".."container" where  kind = 'raw' and granularity = '30' and "metric" = 'cpu_usage_seconds_percentage' and "namespace" = '$ns'  and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and time >=now()-30s and time < now()+ 15m  group by time(30s)) where count = $count_pod

panels.title: CPU: Observation, and Prediction (in CPU milicore)

targets.query: select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."container" where kind = 'raw' and granularity = '30' and "metric" = 'memory_usage_bytes' and "name" =~ /^[[h_container]]$/ and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and "namespace" = '$ns'  AND time >= now() - 60m and time < now()  group by time(30s)

select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."container" where kind = 'upper_bound' and granularity = '30' and "metric" = 'memory_usage_bytes' and "name" =~ /^[[h_container]]$/ and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and "namespace" = '$ns'   AND time >= now() and time <= now() + 14m  group by time(30s)

select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."container" where kind = 'lower_bound' and granularity = '30' and "metric" = 'memory_usage_bytes' and "name" =~ /^[[h_container]]$/ and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and "namespace" = '$ns'   AND time >= now() and time <= now() + 14m  group by time(30s)

select sum from (select sum(value), count(value) from "alameda_prediction".."container" where kind = 'raw' and granularity = '30' and "metric" = 'memory_usage_bytes' and "name" =~ /^[[h_container]]$/ and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and "namespace" = '$ns'  AND time >= now() - 30s and time < now()+15m group by time(30s)) where count = $count_pod

select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."container" where  kind = 'raw' and granularity = '3600' and "metric" = 'cpu_usage_seconds_percentage' and "namespace" = '$ns'  and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and  time >= now() -5d and time < now() group by time(3600s)

select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."container" where kind = 'upper_bound' and granularity = '3600' and "metric" = 'cpu_usage_seconds_percentage' and "name" =~ /^[[h_container]]$/ and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and "namespace" = '$ns'   AND time >= now() and time <= now() + 1d group by time(3600s)

select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."container" where kind = 'lower_bound' and granularity = '3600' and "metric" = 'cpu_usage_seconds_percentage' and "name" =~ /^[[h_container]]$/ and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and "namespace" ='$ns'  AND time >= now() and time <= now() + 1d group by time(3600s)

select sum(resource_request_cpu) from "alameda_planning".."container" where granularity = '21600' and "planning_type" = 1 and "name" =~ /^[[h_container]]$/ and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and "namespace" = '$ns' and  time >= now() -5d and time <= now()+1d  group by time(21600s)

select sum(resource_request_cpu) from "alameda_planning".."container" where granularity = '86400' and "name" =~ /^[[h_container]]$/ and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and "planning_type" = 2 and "namespace" = '$ns' and  time >= now() -5d and time <= now()+1d  group by time(86400s)

select sum from (select sum(value), count(value) from "alameda_prediction".."container" where  kind = 'raw' and granularity = '3600' and "metric" = 'cpu_usage_seconds_percentage' and "namespace" = '$ns'  and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and  time >= now() -3600s and time <= now()+1d group by time(3600s)) where count = $count_pod

panels.title: CPU: Observation, and Prediction (in CPU milicore)

select sum from (select sum(value), count(value) from "alameda_prediction".."container" where kind = 'raw' and granularity = '3600' and "metric" = 'memory_usage_bytes' and "name" =~ /^[[h_container]]$/ and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and "namespace" = '$ns'  AND time >= now() - 3600s and time <= now()+1d group by time(3600s)) where count = $count_pod

select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."container" where  kind = 'raw' and granularity = '21600' and "metric" = 'cpu_usage_seconds_percentage' and "namespace" = '$ns'  and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and  time >= now() - 5w and time < now() group by time(21600s)

select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."container" where kind = 'upper_bound' and granularity = '21600' and "metric" = 'cpu_usage_seconds_percentage' and "name" =~ /^[[h_container]]$/ and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and "namespace" = '$ns'   AND time >= now() and time <= now() + 1w group by time(21600s)

select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."container" where kind = 'lower_bound' and granularity = '21600' and "metric" = 'cpu_usage_seconds_percentage' and "name" =~ /^[[h_container]]$/ and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and "namespace" ='$ns'  AND time >= now() and time <= now() + 1w group by time(21600s)

select sum(resource_request_cpu) from "alameda_planning".."container" where granularity = '86400' and "planning_type" = 1 and "name" =~ /^[[h_container]]$/ and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and "namespace" = '$ns' and  time >= now() -5w and time <= now()+1w  group by time(86400s)

select sum(resource_request_cpu) from "alameda_planning".."container" where granularity = '604800' and "name" =~ /^[[h_container]]$/ and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and "planning_type" = 2 and "namespace" = '$ns' and  time >= now() -5w and time <= now()+1w  group by time(604800s)

list.definition: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from container with key="alameda_scaler_namespace"
list.label: Namespace
list.name: ns
list.query: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from container with key="alameda_scaler_namespace"

list.definition: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from container with key="alameda_scaler_name"  where "alameda_scaler_namespace" = '$ns'  and 'Namespace' != '$resource'
list.label: Application
list.name: scaler
list.query: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from container with key="alameda_scaler_name"  where "alameda_scaler_namespace" = '$ns'  and 'Namespace' != '$resource'

list.definition: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from container with key="pod_name" where "alameda_scaler_namespace" = '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" = '$scaler' and 'Container' = '$resource'
list.label: pod
list.name: pod
list.query: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from container with key="pod_name" where "alameda_scaler_namespace" = '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" = '$scaler' and 'Container' = '$resource'

list.definition: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from container with key="name" where "alameda_scaler_namespace" = '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" = '$scaler' and "pod_name" = '$pod' and 'Container' = '$resource'
list.label: container
list.name: container
list.query: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from container with key="name" where "alameda_scaler_namespace" = '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" = '$scaler' and "pod_name" = '$pod' and 'Container' = '$resource'

list.definition: select pod_name, enable_VPA from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"=~ /^[[ns]]$/ and "alameda_scaler_name" =~ /^[[namespace_scaler]]$/
list.label: namespace_pod
list.name: namespace_pod
list.query: select pod_name, enable_VPA from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"=~ /^[[ns]]$/ and "alameda_scaler_name" =~ /^[[namespace_scaler]]$/

list.definition: select "name", enable_VPA from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"=~ /^[[ns]]$/ and "alameda_scaler_name" =~ /^[[namespace_scaler]]$/
list.label: namespace_container
list.name: namespace_container
list.query: select "name", enable_VPA from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"=~ /^[[ns]]$/ and "alameda_scaler_name" =~ /^[[namespace_scaler]]$/

list.definition: select pod_name, enable_VPA from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"= '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" = '$scaler'
list.label: alamedascaler_pod
list.name: alamedascaler_pod
list.query: select pod_name, enable_VPA from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"= '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" = '$scaler'

list.definition: select "name", enable_VPA from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"='$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" = '$scaler' and "pod_name" =~ /^[[alamedascaler_pod]]$/
list.label: alamedascaler_container
list.name: alamedascaler_container
list.query: select "name", enable_VPA from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"='$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" = '$scaler' and "pod_name" =~ /^[[alamedascaler_pod]]$/

list.definition: select pod_name, enable_VPA from (select * from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"='$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" =~ /^[[namespace_scaler]]$/ and 'Namespace' = '$resource'), (select * from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"='$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" = '$scaler' and 'Container' = '$resource' and "pod_name" = '$pod'), (select * from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"='$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" = '$scaler' and 'Application' = '$resource' )
list.label: h_pod
list.name: h_pod
list.query: select pod_name, enable_VPA from (select * from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"='$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" =~ /^[[namespace_scaler]]$/ and 'Namespace' = '$resource'), (select * from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"='$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" = '$scaler' and 'Container' = '$resource' and "pod_name" = '$pod'), (select * from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"='$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" = '$scaler' and 'Application' = '$resource' )

list.definition: select "name", enable_VPA from (select * from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"='$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" =~ /^[[namespace_scaler]]$/ and "pod_name" =~ /^[[namespace_pod]]$/ and 'Namespace' = '$resource'), (select * from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"='$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" = '$scaler' and "pod_name" =~ /^[[alamedascaler_pod]]$/ and 'Application' = '$resource'), (select * from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"='$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" = '$scaler' and "pod_name" = '$pod' and 'Container' = '$resource')
list.label: h_container
list.name: h_container
list.query: select "name", enable_VPA from (select * from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"='$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" =~ /^[[namespace_scaler]]$/ and "pod_name" =~ /^[[namespace_pod]]$/ and 'Namespace' = '$resource'), (select * from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"='$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" = '$scaler' and "pod_name" =~ /^[[alamedascaler_pod]]$/ and 'Application' = '$resource'), (select * from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"='$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" = '$scaler' and "pod_name" = '$pod' and 'Container' = '$resource')

list.definition: select count(pod_name) from (select * from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"='$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" =~ /^[[namespace_scaler]]$/ and 'Namespace' = '$resource'), (select * from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"='$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" = '$scaler' and 'Container' = '$resource' and "pod_name" = '$pod'), (select * from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"='$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" = '$scaler' and 'Application' = '$resource' )
list.label: Count
list.name: count_pod
list.query: select count(pod_name) from (select * from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"='$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" =~ /^[[namespace_scaler]]$/ and 'Namespace' = '$resource'), (select * from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"='$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" = '$scaler' and 'Container' = '$resource' and "pod_name" = '$pod'), (select * from alameda_cluster_status..container where "alameda_scaler_namespace"='$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" = '$scaler' and 'Application' = '$resource' )
